H_Elite_2.texts.name: Unchained Cerberus
H_Elite_2.texts.desc: On the verge of defeat, a Cerberus takes a potent blend of stimulants that pushes them to hysterical strength and debilitating frenzy. At that point, survival is no longer an option.
H_Elite_2.texts.plural.name: Unchained Cerberus

H_Drone.texts.name: Combat Probe
H_Drone.texts.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
H_Drone.texts.plural.name: Combat Probes

H_Drone_Torture.texts.name: Combat Probe
H_Drone_Torture.texts.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
H_Drone_Torture.texts.plural.name: Combat Probes

H_Drone_Piter.texts.name: Combat Probe
H_Drone_Piter.texts.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
H_Drone_Piter.texts.plural.name: Combat Probes

H_Drone_Torture_Piter.texts.name: Combat Probe
H_Drone_Torture_Piter.texts.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
H_Drone_Torture_Piter.texts.plural.name: Combat Probes

H_Drone_Torture_Conquest.texts.name: Combat Probe
H_Drone_Torture_Conquest.texts.desc: This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
H_Drone_Torture_Conquest.texts.plural.name: Combat Probes

H_Elite.texts.name: Executioner
H_Elite.texts.desc: These hulking killing machines, clad in heavy armor and equipped with ever-regenerating shields, feel seemingly impossible to take down, although they are not fully invulnerable.
H_Elite.texts.plural.name: Executioners

H_Ship.texts.name: Harpy
H_Ship.texts.desc: These creepy, undulating crafts bring a large amount of firepower to the fight. They spray missiles at an area without much care for precision.
H_Ship.texts.plural.name: Harpies

H_Frigate.texts.name: Overlord
H_Frigate.texts.desc: Behind its many eyes and heavy shielding, the Overlord frigate hides a self-repairing fleet of vicious drone-ships.
H_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Overlords

H_Sting.texts.name: Sting
H_Sting.texts.desc: A small vicious flying drone controlled from the inside of the [H_Frigate].
H_Sting.texts.plural.name: Stings

H_Hero_1.texts.name: Rabban
H_Hero_1.texts.desc: Nicknamed "the Beast" after murdering his own father, the Count of Lankiveil is every bit as evil and corrupt as his uncle, the Baron Harkonnen. Rabban only rules through violence and terror, making him a dreaded and despised, leader.
H_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Rabban

H_Hero_2.texts.name: Iakin
H_Hero_2.texts.desc: Iakin is the Captain of the House Harkonnen guard. While regarded as decently reliable while on duty, he is a known Semuta addict, which, to some, is enough to cast doubt on all of his abilities.
H_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: Iakin

H_Sleeper.texts.name: Sleeper Agent
H_Sleeper.texts.desc: Feigning fidelity for years, these [Harkonnen-adjective] agents stay dormant, until the right trigger presents itself.
H_Sleeper.texts.plural.name: Sleeper Agents

F_Ornithopter.texts.name: Ornithopter
F_Ornithopter.texts.desc: A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
F_Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Ornithopters

F_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.name: Scavenged Ornithopter
F_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.desc: This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.
F_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.plural.name: Scavenged Ornithopters

F_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.name: Experimental Ornithopter
F_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.
F_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.plural.name: Experimental Ornithopters

F_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.name: Labthopter
F_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.desc: The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
F_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.plural.name: Labthopters

F_Harvester_Mobile.texts.name: Harvesting Caravan
F_Harvester_Mobile.texts.desc: The Fremen Harvesting Team is very efficient at gathering [Spice], and more importantly, at avoiding the dreaded [Sandworm].
F_Harvester_Mobile.texts.plural.name: Harvesting Caravans

F_Harvester.texts.name: Harvesting Team
F_Harvester.texts.desc: The Fremen Harvesting Team is very efficient at gathering [Spice], and more importantly, at avoiding the dreaded [Sandworm].
F_Harvester.texts.plural.name: Harvesting Teams

F_Trooper.texts.name: Warrior
F_Trooper.texts.desc: These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
F_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Warriors

F_Demo.texts.name: Skirmisher
F_Demo.texts.desc: This demolition squad specializes in destroying enemy vehicles.
F_Demo.texts.plural.name: Skirmishers

F_Sneak.texts.name: Infiltrator
F_Sneak.texts.desc: Stealthy units specializing in melee combat, able to exploit weaknesses in the enemies' armor and striking where it hurts most.
F_Sneak.texts.plural.name: Infiltrators

F_Special.texts.name: Mobile Turret
F_Special.texts.desc: Fremen had to adapt their strategies to fight increasingly armored invaders. A small team wielding stolen offworld artillery can wreak havoc into enemies' air units, while remaining discret and fast enough to evade the retribution.
F_Special.texts.plural.name: Mobile Turrets

F_Special_2.texts.name: Mobile Turret
F_Special_2.texts.desc: Fremen had to adapt their strategies to fight increasingly armored invaders. A small team wielding stolen offworld artillery can wreak havoc into enemies' air units, while remaining discret and fast enough to evade the retribution.
F_Special_2.texts.plural.name: Mobile Turrets

F_Elite.texts.name: Fedaykin
F_Elite.texts.desc: The elite Fremen warriors are completely fearless and dreaded by all. No unit is better fitted for skirmishes in the desert, even when grossly outnumbered.
F_Elite.texts.plural.name: Fedaykins

F_Ship.texts.name: Spire
F_Ship.texts.desc: Made from an ornithopter carcass, the Spire differentiate itself by its superior firepower.
F_Ship.texts.plural.name: Spires

F_Frigate.texts.name: Altar
F_Frigate.texts.desc: Made from odds and end of many ships, this aeronef can be customized to meet the needs of its makers.
F_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Altars

F_Hero_1.texts.name: Chani
F_Hero_1.texts.desc: Chani is a young Fremen mothered by the famous imperial planetologist Liet Kynes. A bold and charismatic woman and an adept fighter, she is loyal to her native people and is determined to do whatever it takes to remove any lingering Harkonnen presence from her planet.
F_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Chani

F_Hero_2.texts.name: Otheym
F_Hero_2.texts.desc: Otheym is a renowned and fearsome Fremen fighter who left Sietch Gara Kulon for Sietch Tabr led by Stilgar. A wise and loyal if a bit gruff man, he likes to be in the first lines, be it in combat or through experimenting with new kinds of strategies.
F_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: Otheym

S_Ornithopter.texts.name: Ornithopter
S_Ornithopter.texts.desc: A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
S_Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Ornithopters

S_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.name: Scavenged Ornithopter
S_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.desc: This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.
S_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.plural.name: Scavenged Ornithopters

S_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.name: Experimental Ornithopter
S_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.
S_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.plural.name: Experimental Ornithopters

S_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.name: Labthopter
S_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.desc: The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
S_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.plural.name: Labthopters

S_Harvester.texts.name: Harvester
S_Harvester.texts.desc: A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
S_Harvester.texts.plural.name: Harvesters

S_Trooper.texts.name: Scavenger
S_Trooper.texts.desc: Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.
S_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Scavengers

S_Demo.texts.name: Wrecker
S_Demo.texts.desc: Plunderers who specialize in the use of drugs and chemical weapons, not only damaging enemy units, but also spoiling their supplies and poisoning their food.
S_Demo.texts.plural.name: Wreckers

S_Sneak.texts.name: Sniper
S_Sneak.texts.desc: These lightweight units know when to strike. Their specialty is ambushing units stranded in the desert and already in a bad spot.
S_Sneak.texts.plural.name: Snipers

S_Drone.texts.name: Scavenging Drone
S_Drone.texts.desc: These remote-controlled utility machines will help gather lost equipment on the battlefield, and turn them into useful weapons.
S_Drone.texts.plural.name: Scavenging Drones

S_Elite.texts.name: Free Company
S_Elite.texts.desc: Highly trained warriors and assassins, using stealth to strike when one least expects them.
S_Elite.texts.plural.name: Free Companies

S_Ship.texts.name: Banshee
S_Ship.texts.desc: This stealth recon ship has been equipped with the pride of smuggler electro-magnetic weaponery.
S_Ship.texts.plural.name: Banshees

S_Frigate.texts.name: Wraith
S_Frigate.texts.desc: This old chemical lab station has been repurposed for warfare. Continuously releasing heavy gases on the battefield, the Wraith induces terror in the hearts of everyone who crosses its path.
S_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Wraiths

S_Hero_1.texts.name: Drisq
S_Hero_1.texts.desc: Drisq is Esmar Tuek's loyal quartermaster, managing supplies and commodities for the whole Sietch. She is also regularly involved in the logistics of her master's smuggling operations.
S_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Drisq

S_Hero_2.texts.name: Bannerjee
S_Hero_2.texts.desc: Bannerjee serves as the head of security at Tuek's Sietch. A stout, intimidating hulk of a man with a jaded outlook on life, he is a reliable ally when it comes to protecting Esmar's best interests.
S_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: Bannerjee

S_Demo_Militia.texts.name: Wrecker
S_Demo_Militia.texts.desc: Plunderers who specialize in the use of drugs and chemical weapons, not only damaging enemy units, but also spoiling their supplies and poisoning their food.
S_Demo_Militia.texts.plural.name: Wreckers

S_Trooper_Marauder.texts.name: Marauder
S_Trooper_Marauder.texts.desc: An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
S_Trooper_Marauder.texts.plural.name: Marauders

S_Elite_Marauder.texts.name: Ranged Marauder
S_Elite_Marauder.texts.desc: These maurauders are equipped with rifles and prefer to fight from a distance.
S_Elite_Marauder.texts.plural.name: Ranged Marauders

S_Demo_Marauder.texts.name: Marauder Artificer
S_Demo_Marauder.texts.desc: These maurauders are equipped with grenades and prefer to fight from a distance.
S_Demo_Marauder.texts.plural.name: Marauder Artificers

S_Trooper1.texts.name: Reserve Scavenger
S_Trooper1.texts.desc: Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.
S_Trooper1.texts.plural.name: Reserve Scavengers

C_Ornithopter.texts.name: Ornithopter
C_Ornithopter.texts.desc: A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
C_Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Ornithopters

C_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.name: Scavenged Ornithopter
C_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.desc: This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.
C_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.plural.name: Scavenged Ornithopters

C_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.name: Experimental Ornithopter
C_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.
C_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.plural.name: Experimental Ornithopters

C_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.name: Labthopter
C_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.desc: The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
C_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.plural.name: Labthopters

C_Harvester.texts.name: Harvester
C_Harvester.texts.desc: A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
C_Harvester.texts.plural.name: Harvesters

C_Trooper.texts.name: Conscript Swordman
C_Trooper.texts.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
C_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Conscript Swordmen

C_Trooper_Aramsham.texts.name: Conscript Swordman
C_Trooper_Aramsham.texts.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
C_Trooper_Aramsham.texts.plural.name: Conscript Swordmen

C_Soldier.texts.name: Conscript Rifleman
C_Soldier.texts.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
C_Soldier.texts.plural.name: Conscript Riflemen

C_Soldier_Aramsham.texts.name: Conscript Rifleman
C_Soldier_Aramsham.texts.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
C_Soldier_Aramsham.texts.plural.name: Conscript Riflemen

C_Special.texts.name: Incinerator
C_Special.texts.desc: These shock troops are equipped with a device that throws burning napalm. This terrible weapon brings agonizing death to its target and awful nightmares to those who see it in action.
C_Special.texts.plural.name: Incinerators

C_Drone.texts.name: Artillery Drone
C_Drone.texts.desc: Once stabilized, these remote-controlled mobile artilleries rain deafening shells on even well-defended positions. Make sure to keep the enemy away from them, as they are quite vulnerable at close range.
C_Drone.texts.plural.name: Artillery Drones

C_Drone_Deployed.texts.name: Artillery Drone
C_Drone_Deployed.texts.desc: Once stabilized, these remote-controlled mobile artilleries rain deafening shells on even well-defended positions. Make sure to keep the enemy away from them, as they are quite vulnerable at close range.
C_Drone_Deployed.texts.plural.name: Artillery Drones

C_Elite.texts.name: Sardaukar
C_Elite.texts.desc: Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.
C_Elite.texts.plural.name: Sardaukar

C_Ship.texts.name: Hammer
C_Ship.texts.desc: The Hammer is a specialized bomber of the Imperium, designed to deliver high-caliber explosives with frightening precision and break any defensive position.
C_Ship.texts.plural.name: Hammers

C_Frigate.texts.name: Cronos
C_Frigate.texts.desc: The Cronos is a symbol of the Imperium's power. It is equipped with powerful flanking cannons and the full infrastructure necessary to land shuttles.
C_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Cronos

C_Frigate_Deployed.texts.name: Cronos
C_Frigate_Deployed.texts.desc: The Cronos is a symbol of the Imperium's power. It is equipped with powerful flanking cannons and the full infrastructure necessary to land shuttles.
C_Frigate_Deployed.texts.plural.name: Cronos

C_Hero_1.texts.name: Wensicia
C_Hero_1.texts.desc: Wensicia is the third daughter of Shaddam IV. She is trained in stewardship and takes care of much of the day to day logistics of the imperial palace. Her impulsiveness often causes trouble, but brings her to rapid success even more often.
C_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Wensicia

C_LazaTiger.texts.name: Laza Tiger
C_LazaTiger.texts.desc: These beast are genetically modified feline controlled remotely through brain implants. They could be trained to murder children, but who would do such an unethical thing?
C_LazaTiger.texts.plural.name: Laza Tigers

C_Hero_2.texts.name: Aramsham
C_Hero_2.texts.desc: Captain Aramsham is a proud Sardaukar officer, used to wielding authority over his subordinates, conscripts of the Landsraad and Sardaukar alike. Pragmatic and experienced, he is often put in charge of dangerous operations, which he always returns victorious from.
C_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: Aramsham

C_Soldier_Conquest.texts.name: Conscript Trainee
C_Soldier_Conquest.texts.desc: Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
C_Soldier_Conquest.texts.plural.name: Conscript Trainees

E_Ornithopter.texts.name: Ornithopter
E_Ornithopter.texts.desc: A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
E_Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Ornithopters

E_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.name: Scavenged Ornithopter
E_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.desc: This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.
E_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.plural.name: Scavenged Ornithopters

E_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.name: Experimental Ornithopter
E_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.
E_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.plural.name: Experimental Ornithopters

E_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.name: Labthopter
E_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.desc: The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
E_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.plural.name: Labthopters

E_Harvester.texts.name: Harvester
E_Harvester.texts.desc: A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
E_Harvester.texts.plural.name: Harvesters

E_Trooper.texts.name: Squire
E_Trooper.texts.desc: The squires have sworn to serve Ecazi nobility. They are used to taking the biggest blows from enemy forces, and focus on softening defences for stronger units to steal the show.
E_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Squires

E_Soldier.texts.name: Musketeer
E_Soldier.texts.desc: [Ecaz-longname] employs a lot of professional hunters, to keep the large game population of their home planet in check, feed the court, and provide diversion. During war times, they are often hired to chase a very different quarry.
E_Soldier.texts.plural.name: Musketeers

E_Special.texts.name: Fencer
E_Special.texts.desc: Fencers trained all day, every day to be the best duelist in the universe. On the battlefield, they often take the heat off of their lesser peers.
E_Special.texts.plural.name: Fencers

E_Drone.texts.name: War Banner
E_Drone.texts.desc: A good banner is not just a piece of fabric. It's an embodiement of everything one fights for. As long as the War Banner stands, [Ecaz-longname]'s unique blend of style and honor shall be felt by all on the battlefield.
E_Drone.texts.plural.name: War Banners

E_Elite.texts.name: Knight
E_Elite.texts.desc: Ecazi nobility prides itself on its bravery and martial prowess. It is customary for young nobles to follow the path of the knight, to demonstrate in the fray that they indeed possess such qualities.
E_Elite.texts.plural.name: Knights

E_Ship.texts.name: Siren
E_Ship.texts.desc: The Siren's elegant form and graceful flight hides a dangerous anti-material weapon. It emits colorful patterns and focused noises toward its target, saturating sensors and softening defenses of drones and ships.
E_Ship.texts.plural.name: Sirens

E_Frigate.texts.name: Monument
E_Frigate.texts.desc: The Monument of Eternal Grace is a representation of the flowing nature of Art, a demonstration of Ecazi craftmanship, and a powerful weapon of war, all rolled into one.
E_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Monuments

E_Hero_1.texts.name: Whitmore
E_Hero_1.texts.desc: Whitmore Bludd was a renowned instructor at the Ginaz swordmaster school. After the fall of Ginaz, he entered the service of House Ecaz, first as Ilesa's bodyguard, and then as warmaster.
E_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Whitmore

E_Hero_2.texts.name: Ilesa
E_Hero_2.texts.desc: Ilesa is the second daughter of Armanda. Having barely survived an assassination attempt at the onset of adulthood, losing an arm and an eye in the process, Ilesa has grown into a bitter and serious woman, with no qualms about using her infirmity to guilt people into doing her bidding.
E_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: Ilesa

E_HelpfulEntourage.texts.name: Follower
E_HelpfulEntourage.texts.desc: A real star always has an entourage.
E_HelpfulEntourage.texts.plural.name: Followers

V_Ornithopter.texts.name: Orship
V_Ornithopter.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis, as well as many other secret abilities.
V_Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Orships

V_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.name: Scavenged Ornithopter
V_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.desc: This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.
V_Ornithopter_Scavenged.texts.plural.name: Scavenged Ornithopters

V_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.name: Experimental Ornithopter
V_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.desc: The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.
V_Ornithopter_Prototype.texts.plural.name: Experimental Ornithopters

V_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.name: Labthopter
V_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.desc: The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
V_Ornithopter_Lab.texts.plural.name: Labthopters

V_Harvester.texts.name: Combine Harvester Drone
V_Harvester.texts.desc: Sifting the sand delicately to not attract [Sandworm]s, the combine harvester is a marvel of Ixian technology. It is piloted fully remotely, making [Spice] gathering a safe and pleasant activity.
V_Harvester.texts.plural.name: Combine Harvester Drones

V_Harvester_Deployed.texts.name: Combine Harvester Drone
V_Harvester_Deployed.texts.desc: Sifting the sand delicately to not attract [Sandworm]s, the combine harvester is a marvel of Ixian technology. It is piloted fully remotely, making [Spice] gathering a safe and pleasant activity.
V_Harvester_Deployed.texts.plural.name: Combine Harvester Drones

V_Trooper.texts.name: Fighting Mek
V_Trooper.texts.desc: Self-learning combat drones using a shifting repertoire of deadly moves. First designed to train the Ixian nobility in close combat, the fighting meks have been increasingly integrated into Vernius military forces.
V_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Fighting Meks

V_Soldier.texts.name: Suboid Soldier
V_Soldier.texts.desc: Suboids are a race of humans genetically designed for manual labor. They are diligent and methodical, but lack any capacity for imagination and creativity. They can occasionally participate in warfare when the need arises.
V_Soldier.texts.plural.name: Suboid Soldiers

V_Special.texts.name: Railgun Drone
V_Special.texts.desc: Railgun Drones fire a projectile accelerated with an electromagnetic coil. These high-tech weapons can reach marginally better projectile speeds than regular firearms, if the cannon is long enough.
V_Special.texts.plural.name: Railgun Drones

V_Drone.texts.name: Resonance Drone
V_Drone.texts.desc: The Resonance Drone induces a self-repeating electrical feedback loop in its Holtzman Coil, charging nearby Faraday cages with a powerful electrostatic effect. This stratagem has been used by Ixian armies for centuries.
V_Drone.texts.plural.name: Resonance Drones

V_Drone_Militia.texts.name: Automated Militia
V_Drone_Militia.texts.desc: Drones can help repel an assault as well as any weapons. These drones are even piloted through the Nodal Network.
V_Drone_Militia.texts.plural.name: Automated Militia

V_Elite.texts.name: Fight-Engineer
V_Elite.texts.desc: Fight-Engineers are a caste of Ixian specialists constantly trying to improve the programming of fighting drones. They often appear on the front, where they can provide emergency repairs or take direct control of the drone army.
V_Elite.texts.plural.name: Fight-Engineers

V_Elite_Deployed.texts.name: Fight-Engineer
V_Elite_Deployed.texts.desc: Fight-Engineers are a caste of Ixian specialists constantly trying to improve the programming of fighting drones. They often appear on the front, where they can provide emergency repairs or take direct control of the drone army.
V_Elite_Deployed.texts.plural.name: Fight-Engineers

V_Ship.texts.name: Spirit
V_Ship.texts.desc: The Spirit's conditional camouflage lets it step in and out of the shadows to surprise an unsuspecting opponent, or feint an assault.
V_Ship.texts.plural.name: Spirits

V_Frigate.texts.name: Folder Relay
V_Frigate.texts.desc: The Folder Relay is the first ship of its kind. Used as a support ship during planetary warfare, it integrates a full Space Folder making it theoretically capable of instant interstellar travel. In practice it is used for short range teleportation for retreat or maneuvers.
V_Frigate.texts.plural.name: Folder Relays

V_Hero_1.texts.name: Nuwa
V_Hero_1.texts.desc: Nuwa is the brillant automation engineer behind a lot of recent breakthroughs in self-learning drone technology. Her latest project is taking place on Arrakis and she will personally make sure that everything goes according to plan.
V_Hero_1.texts.plural.name: Nuwa

V_Hero_2.texts.name: C'Tair
V_Hero_2.texts.desc: C'Tair is the son of Cammar Pilru. During the suboid revolt, he remained on Ix where he single-handedly led a resistance movement that eventually overthrew the tleilaxu oppressors. The experience has tainted C'Tair with terrible trauma, but also taught him to defend his home with all his strength.
V_Hero_2.texts.plural.name: C'Tair

Renegades_Trooper.texts.name: Renegade
Renegades_Trooper.texts.desc: Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
Renegades_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Renegades

Renegades_Demo.texts.name: Demolition Renegade
Renegades_Demo.texts.desc: Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
Renegades_Demo.texts.plural.name: Demolition Renegades

Renegades_Drone.texts.name: Renegade Drone
Renegades_Drone.texts.desc: Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
Renegades_Drone.texts.plural.name: Renegade Drones

Renegade_Ship.texts.name: Renegade Ship
Renegade_Ship.texts.desc: Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
Renegade_Ship.texts.plural.name: Renegade Ships

Renegades_Leader.texts.name: Renegade Leader
Renegades_Leader.texts.desc: Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
Renegades_Leader.texts.plural.name: Renegade Leaders

Rebels.texts.name: Rebel
Rebels.texts.desc: These villagers decided to rebel against the oppressing authorities and are now conducting a revolt.
Rebels.texts.plural.name: Rebels

BrainwashedRebel.texts.name: Brainwashed Rebel
BrainwashedRebel.texts.desc: These villagers decided against rebelling against the oppressing authorities and have now been brainwashed into fighting for their oppressor.
BrainwashedRebel.texts.plural.name: Brainwashed Rebels

Raider.texts.name: Raider
Raider.texts.desc: Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raider.texts.plural.name: Raiders

Raider_Ranged.texts.name: Ranged Raider
Raider_Ranged.texts.desc: Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raider_Ranged.texts.plural.name: Ranged Raiders

Raider_Demo.texts.name: Raider Artificer
Raider_Demo.texts.desc: Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raider_Demo.texts.plural.name: Raider Artificers

Raider_Veteran.texts.name: Veteran Raider
Raider_Veteran.texts.desc: Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raider_Veteran.texts.plural.name: Veteran Raiders

Pillagers.texts.name: Marauder
Pillagers.texts.desc: An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
Pillagers.texts.plural.name: Marauders

Pillagers_Ranged.texts.name: Ranged Marauder
Pillagers_Ranged.texts.desc: These maurauders are equipped with rifles and prefer to fight from a distance.
Pillagers_Ranged.texts.plural.name: Ranged Marauders

Pillagers_Demo.texts.name: Marauder Artificer
Pillagers_Demo.texts.desc: These maurauders are equipped with grenades and prefer to fight from a distance.
Pillagers_Demo.texts.plural.name: Marauder Artificers

Pillagers_Veteran.texts.name: Veteran Marauder
Pillagers_Veteran.texts.desc: In their line of work, not many men make it to an age ripe enough to call themselves veterans. When they do, they should not be taken lightly.
Pillagers_Veteran.texts.plural.name: Veteran Marauders

Pillagers_Leader.texts.name: Marauder Leader
Pillagers_Leader.texts.desc: In their line of work, not many men make it to an age ripe enough to call themselves veterans. When they do, they should not be taken lightly.
Pillagers_Leader.texts.plural.name: Marauder Leaders

Raider_LandsraadSoldiers.texts.name: Landsraad Guard
Raider_LandsraadSoldiers.texts.desc: [Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
Raider_LandsraadSoldiers.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Guards

Raider_LandsraadRanged.texts.name: Landsraad Judge
Raider_LandsraadRanged.texts.desc: The honor guard of [Landsraad-longname] is rarely seen on the field, but they are fearsome fighters nonetheless.
Raider_LandsraadRanged.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Judges

Raider_LandsraadDemo.texts.name: Landsraad Punisher
Raider_LandsraadDemo.texts.desc: In exceptional cases where [Landsraad-longname] needs to take diciplinary action, some guards are trained to use powerful siege equipment.
Raider_LandsraadDemo.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Punishers

Militia_Sietch_Melee.texts.name: Warrior
Militia_Sietch_Melee.texts.desc: These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
Militia_Sietch_Melee.texts.plural.name: Warriors

Militia_Sietch_Demo.texts.name: Skirmisher
Militia_Sietch_Demo.texts.desc: This demolition squad specializes in destroying enemy vehicles.
Militia_Sietch_Demo.texts.plural.name: Skirmishers

Militia_Sietch_Elite.texts.name: Fedaykin
Militia_Sietch_Elite.texts.desc: The elite Fremen warriors are completely fearless and dreaded by all. No unit is better fitted for skirmishes in the desert, even when grossly outnumbered.
Militia_Sietch_Elite.texts.plural.name: Fedaykins

Raider_Sardaukar.texts.name: Sardaukar
Raider_Sardaukar.texts.desc: Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.
Raider_Sardaukar.texts.plural.name: Sardaukar

House_Soldier.texts.name: House Legionary
House_Soldier.texts.desc: Some people are just looking for a fight. If they belong to a Landsraad house that is currently at peace, they might become legionaries, going to war on distant front, for allies of their liege house.
House_Soldier.texts.plural.name: House Legionaries

I_Trooper.texts.name: Burned Ones
I_Trooper.texts.desc: Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
I_Trooper.texts.plural.name: Burned Ones

I_Demo.texts.name: Destroyers
I_Demo.texts.desc: Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
I_Demo.texts.plural.name: Destroyers

I_Elite.texts.name: Rampagers
I_Elite.texts.desc: Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
I_Elite.texts.plural.name: Rampagers

Militia_Melee.texts.name: Militia
Militia_Melee.texts.desc: A village's militia is comprised of various civilians who may lack combat training, but not enthusiasm.
Militia_Melee.texts.plural.name: Militia

Militia_Ranged.texts.name: Ranged Militia
Militia_Ranged.texts.desc: Members of the militia equipped with guns and therefore able to fight from a distance.
Militia_Ranged.texts.plural.name: Ranged Militia

Militia_Demo.texts.name: Demolition Militia
Militia_Demo.texts.desc: Militia using explosives to wreck havoc in enemy lines or destroy their vehicles.
Militia_Demo.texts.plural.name: Demolition Militia

Militia_Heavy.texts.name: Heavy Militia
Militia_Heavy.texts.desc: Some militia have previous combat training and automatically become veterans of sorts.
Militia_Heavy.texts.plural.name: Heavy Militia

LandsraadSoldiers_Chart.texts.name: Landsraad Guard
LandsraadSoldiers_Chart.texts.desc: [Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
LandsraadSoldiers_Chart.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Guards

LandsraadRanged_Chart.texts.name: Landsraad Judge
LandsraadRanged_Chart.texts.desc: The honor guard of [Landsraad-longname] is rarely seen on the field, but they are fearsome fighters nonetheless.
LandsraadRanged_Chart.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Judges

LandsraadSoldiers_Faufreluches.texts.name: Landsraad Guard
LandsraadSoldiers_Faufreluches.texts.desc: [Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, lent only to the most favored houses.
LandsraadSoldiers_Faufreluches.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Guards

LandsraadRanged_Faufreluches.texts.name: Landsraad Judge
LandsraadRanged_Faufreluches.texts.desc: The honor guard of [Landsraad-longname] is rarely seen on the field, but they are fearsome fighters nonetheless.
LandsraadRanged_Faufreluches.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Judges

LandsraadDemo_Faufreluches.texts.name: Landsraad Punisher
LandsraadDemo_Faufreluches.texts.desc: In exceptional cases where [Landsraad-longname] needs to take diciplinary action, some guards are trained to use powerful siege equipment.
LandsraadDemo_Faufreluches.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Punishers

LandsraadSoldiers_Res.texts.name: Landsraad Guard
LandsraadSoldiers_Res.texts.desc: [Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
LandsraadSoldiers_Res.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Guards

LandsraadSoldiers_Dev.texts.name: Landsraad Guard
LandsraadSoldiers_Dev.texts.desc: [Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
LandsraadSoldiers_Dev.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Guards

LandsraadDemo_Res.texts.name: Landsraad Punisher
LandsraadDemo_Res.texts.desc: In exceptional cases where [Landsraad-longname] needs to take diciplinary action, some guards are trained to use powerful siege equipment.
LandsraadDemo_Res.texts.plural.name: Landsraad Punishers

Discovery_FremenTrooper.texts.name: Fremen Mercenary
Discovery_FremenTrooper.texts.desc: These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
Discovery_FremenTrooper.texts.plural.name: Fremen Mercenaries

Battle_FremenInsurgent.texts.name: Fremen Insurgent
Battle_FremenInsurgent.texts.desc: These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
Battle_FremenInsurgent.texts.plural.name: Fremen Insurgents

Discovery_Sniper.texts.name: Ranged Marauder
Discovery_Sniper.texts.desc: These lightweight units know when to strike. Their specialty is ambushing units stranded in the desert and already in a bad spot.
Discovery_Sniper.texts.plural.name: Ranged Marauders

Discovery_Marauder.texts.name: Marauder
Discovery_Marauder.texts.desc: Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.
Discovery_Marauder.texts.plural.name: Marauders

Mercenaries.texts.name: Mercenary
Mercenaries.texts.desc: An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates, and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
Mercenaries.texts.plural.name: Mercenaries

Mercenaries_Faufreluches.texts.name: Mercenary
Mercenaries_Faufreluches.texts.desc: An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates, and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
Mercenaries_Faufreluches.texts.plural.name: Mercenaries

Mercenaries_Free.texts.name: Mercenary
Mercenaries_Free.texts.desc: An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates, and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
Mercenaries_Free.texts.plural.name: Mercenaries

Assassin.texts.name: Assassin
Assassin.texts.desc: Contracts with assassins are common in the Imperium. But succeeding in reaching the Great Houses always requires a lot more logistics.
Assassin.texts.plural.name: Assassins

Assassin_Resolution.texts.name: Assassin
Assassin_Resolution.texts.desc: Contracts with assassins are common in the Imperium. But succeeding in reaching the Great Houses always requires a lot more logistics.
Assassin_Resolution.texts.plural.name: Assassins

Assassin_Conquest.texts.name: Assassin
Assassin_Conquest.texts.desc: Contracts with assassins are common in the Imperium. But succeeding in reaching the Great Houses always requires a lot more logistics.
Assassin_Conquest.texts.plural.name: Assassins

C_Elite_ImperialMandate.texts.name: Sardaukar
C_Elite_ImperialMandate.texts.desc: Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.
C_Elite_ImperialMandate.texts.plural.name: Sardaukar

Ornithopter.texts.name: Ornithopter
Ornithopter.texts.desc: A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
Ornithopter.texts.plural.name: Ornithopters

Harvester.texts.name: Harvester
Harvester.texts.desc: A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
Harvester.texts.plural.name: Harvesters

CombineHarvester.texts.name: Combine Harvester Drone
CombineHarvester.texts.desc: Sifting the sand delicately to not attract [Sandworm]s, the combine harvester is a marvel of Ixian technology. It is piloted fully remotely, making [Spice] gathering a safe and pleasant activity.
CombineHarvester.texts.plural.name: Combine Harvester Drones

Sardaukar.texts.name: Sardaukar
Sardaukar.texts.desc: Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.
Sardaukar.texts.plural.name: Sardaukar

ArmySiegeSietch.name: Attack
ArmySiegeSietch.desc:
Engages with the [Sietch]'s [Militia].
This will degrade your relations with the [Sietch].
If the [Militia] is defeated, you will be able to occupy it to pillage it.

InvestigateVillage.name: Investigate
InvestigateVillage.desc:
Investigating the village will detect if there is an [InfiltrationCell] in the area.
Applies [RecentPurge] once completed.

SendAssassin.name: Send Assassin
SendAssassin.desc: Send your [Assassin] to make progress in the assassination attempt.

Annex.name: Annex
Annex.texts.desc: Annex the Village for your faction.

Liberate.name: Liberate
Liberate.texts.desc: Liberate the village. It will go back to neutral state.

Pillage.name: Pillage
Pillage.texts.desc: Heavily damages the [Village]. Loot its production and render the village unusable for a month.

PillageSietch.name: Pillage
PillageSietch.texts.desc: Pillage the [Sietch]. It will no longer be interactible and no raid will come out of it for a month.

Raze.name: Raze
Raze.texts.desc: Destroys the base, defeating its owner if it was its last one

MainBase_Attack.name: Main Base attack
MainBase_Attack.desc: Sending an attack on a Main Base

Mission_NonHostile_Detected.name: Non-Hostile Operation
Mission_NonHostile_Detected.desc: A non-hostile Operation in their territory is detected

Mission_Hostile_Detected.name: Hostile Operation
Mission_Hostile_Detected.desc: A hostile Operation in their territory is detected

MissileBattery_Attacks.name: Their [MissileBattery] attack on sight
MissileBattery_Attacks.desc: Missile Batteries attack each other's units on sight

Contested_Sieges.name: Contest each other's Sieges
Contested_Sieges.desc: Contesting a Siege by walking in it

Resource_Trade.name: Trading is <good>allowed</good>
Resource_Trade.desc: Trading economic resources with one another

NoSupplyLoss_Territory.name: No [Supply] loss in their territory
NoSupplyLoss_Territory.desc: Your units do not lose supply in their territory

Bazookas.name: Bazooka
Bazookas.desc: Throwing grenades by hand only gets you so far. If you have any ambition in life, you need a bazooka.

DualGuns.name: Dual Guns
DualGuns.desc: When professionals need to keep a little bit of distance between them and their target, they use reliable tools, rather than flashy ones.

SardaukarCleaver.name: Sardaukar's Cleaver
SardaukarCleaver.desc: Swords can be optimized for cutting through bones and flesh.

SniperRifles.name: Long Rifle
SniperRifles.desc: Long rifles are perfect to keep a safe distance from the target.

AssassinGear.name: Assassin Gear
AssassinGear.desc: With the right tools, one can really benefit from sneak attacks and weaknesses in their opponent's armour.

RedFluid.name: Red Fluid
RedFluid.desc: This red fluid is not blood. Not exactly. But it does go into one's veins.

OffensiveMindset.name: Offensive Mindset
OffensiveMindset.desc: Developing a healthy competitive spirit towards the opponents can lead to some excess, but it helps when hacking each other to bits is in order.

CrossfireTactics.name: Crossfire Tactics
CrossfireTactics.desc: Attacking the same enemy carefully from two sides makes it difficult for them to react, without causing friendly fire.

AutomaticWeapons.name: Automatic Weapons
AutomaticWeapons.desc: Semi-automatic weapons use the excess energy of a discharge to load the next bullet in the chamber, allowing the user to fire again immediately.

HeavyLoads.name: Heavy Loads
HeavyLoads.desc: While it's usually not recommended by the manufacturer, loading a weapon with oversized ammunition can have spectacular results.

BirdSlayer.name: Bird Slayer
BirdSlayer.desc: Shooting large birds out of the sky is so satisfying. This weapon is optimized to find a flailing target in a clear sky.

WhistlingAmmo.name: Whistling Ammo
WhistlingAmmo.desc: This ammo vibrates strongly in subsonic frequencies, creating waves of turbulence breaking the delicate equipment of most flying vessels.

ExoticCompounds.name: Exotic Compounds
ExoticCompounds.desc: A specific mix of chemical compounds increases the damaging potential of the [!C_Special] even further.

PhosphorusMix.name: Phosphorus Mix
PhosphorusMix.desc: White phosphorus incorporated into the burning mix of the [!C_Special] is responsible for many particularly agonizing deaths, even after the battle is over.

BattlefieldFrenzy.name: Battlefield Frenzy
BattlefieldFrenzy.desc: Sardaukars' sense of duty shines brighter on major battlefronts, when they are surrounded by many supporting levies.

ChasingStance.name: Chasing Stance
ChasingStance.desc: When pursuing an enemy, tiring them down is easier than being fast.

DismantlingTools.name: Dismantling Tools
DismantlingTools.desc: With the right tools, the most sturdy tin can can be opened.

ConcentratedToxins.name: Concentrated Toxins
ConcentratedToxins.desc: A concentrated toxic gas will dissipate in the open, but for the person right next to it, it won't matter much.

TraumaticRepeater.name: Traumatic Repeater
TraumaticRepeater.desc: Some psychoactive drugs makes people re-live their most painful traumas. It's especially unpleasant when those memories are actually happening at the same time.

StingingGaz.name: Stinging Gas
StingingGaz.desc: Sometimes, it's better to cause pain than actual harm. As always, the [!S_Demo] has the right chemical for the job.

RecursiveLense.name: Recursive Lens
RecursiveLense.desc: An incredibly precise recursive lens is only really useful if the enemy doesn't move too much.

PropellingAmmo.name: Propelling Ammo
PropellingAmmo.desc: This ammo keeps accelerating during its flight. Ideal to hit very far targets.

IncendiaryAmmo.name: Incendiary Ammo
IncendiaryAmmo.desc: This ammo releases a burning compound into the air upon contact.

SismicAmmo.name: Seismic Ammo
SismicAmmo.desc: This ammo breaks the ground and propagates a powerful seismic wave, damaging anything in a large area.

BarrelCleaner.name: Barrel Cleaner
BarrelCleaner.desc: A clean weapon is the mark of a true gentleman. It's also a sensible way to make it function better.

VowOfBravery.name: Vow of Bravery
VowOfBravery.desc: I will never let fear stop my arm!

VowOfFervor.name: Vow of Fervor
VowOfFervor.desc: I will always dedicate my entire being to my goals!

VowOfHeroism.name: Vow of Heroism
VowOfHeroism.desc: I will surpass myself, to reach my full potential!

VowOfHonor.name: Vow of Honor
VowOfHonor.desc: I will never belittle the people I serve!

ScatterGrenades.name: Scatter Grenades
ScatterGrenades.desc: A cluster of small grenades that detach at the height of the throw will cover more area, while remaining as destructive.

AntiPersonalShrapnels.name: Anti-personnel Shrapnels
AntiPersonalShrapnels.desc: Adding small bits of metal all around the grenades will naturally produce shrapnel that stays inside the body and causes constant pain and bleeding.

PreLoadedWeapons.name: Pre-Loaded Weapons
PreLoadedWeapons.desc: Having a spare canon already loaded will make the first few rounds of combat a lot more impactful.

SelfSufficiency.name: Self-sufficiency
SelfSufficiency.desc: [!F_Elite]s are trained to operate on their own, without any outside assistance when needed.

DevastatingStrikes.name: Devastating Strikes
DevastatingStrikes.desc: Hitting with resolve and strength will make most close formations panic and make mistakes.

TinkeringGear.name: Tinkering Gear
TinkeringGear.desc: [!V_Soldier]s are constantly improving the machines surrounding them, if they are provided with some basic tools.

HeavyArmor.name: Heavy Armor
HeavyArmor.desc: A closed full-body armor increases the odds of survival in combat significantly, at the cost of reduced swiftness.

MakersEffigy.name: Maker's Effigy
MakersEffigy.desc: Faith in the Maker keeps the [Fremen] strong in adversity.

FrontLineTactics.name: Front Line Tactics
FrontLineTactics.desc: Supporting your brother-in-arms on the front line is key to surviving many fights.

ParryingArmguards.name: Parrying Armguards
ParryingArmguards.desc: When you cannot rely on shields anymore, older parrying apparatus come back in fashion.

DistractingFlashes.name: Distracting Flashes
DistractingFlashes.desc: An array of strong lights flashing randomly makes it very unpleasant to fire on a target, or anything close from it.

DistorsionUmbrella.name: Distortion Umbrella
DistorsionUmbrella.desc: Holographic technology cannot offer true protection, but it can direct image distortions to make targeting more difficult.

CoverTactics.name: Cover Tactics
CoverTactics.desc: Protecting each other during retreat and maneuvering saves lives and helps to get reinforcements sooner.

HibernationBreastplate.name: Hibernation Breastplate
HibernationBreastplate.desc: If you don't care about severely limiting the wearer's movements, it's easy to build a solid armor.

MeatArmor.name: Meat Armor
MeatArmor.desc: Using fresh corpses as protection is a skill that requires specialized equipment.

SupportingTactics.name: Supporting Tactics
SupportingTactics.desc: While they constitute most of the imperial army, conscripts are often thought as supporting levy to the powerful Sardaukar.

LastStandProtocols.name: Last Stand Protocols
LastStandProtocols.desc: When the battle seems lost, you can still slow the enemies as much as possible by refusing to die.

MorbidClimax.name: Morbid Climax
MorbidClimax.desc: The right drug cocktail can be used to completely prevent death... for a very short amount of time.

GnarlyRecyclers.name: Gnarly Recyclers
GnarlyRecyclers.desc: Taking from the dead might not be pretty, but it is a good survival strategy.

TerrifyingMask.name: Terrifying Mask
TerrifyingMask.desc: The terrible helmet of the [C_Special] is adorned with reminders of the suffering they inflict.

LiveReformation.name: Live Reformation
LiveReformation.desc: Being able to reshuffle conscript formations at the front to optimize pressure on the enemy is one of the most impressive features of the imperial army.

KnightlyProtector.name: Knightly Protector
KnightlyProtector.desc: The squire's first duty is to protect any noble [!E_Elite] in the vicinity.

PricklySpear.name: Prickly Spear
PricklySpear.desc: Sometimes, the only way to fulfill the protector's duty is to make him a target.

PersonalMantlet.name: Personal Mantlet
PersonalMantlet.desc: Technology has evolved, but the basic need of protecting oneself while advancing towards combat has remained the same.

SoberingMedication.name: Sobering Medication
SoberingMedication.desc: A proper [!E_Trooper] should never allow himself to get too excited. He must always keep his head cool in the face of duty.

SandCover.name: Sand Cover
SandCover.desc: Fremen [!F_Trooper]s use the sand to make themselves harder to target at range.

ConfusingTactics.name: Confusing Tactics
ConfusingTactics.desc: In a war, soldiers generally prefer to keep their friends on one side and their enemies on the other, which is not always easy with slippery opponents.

ShelterMaps.name: Shelter Maps
ShelterMaps.desc: Knowing all the good cover spots helps with the guerilla style of the Fremen army.

WorkShelter.name: Work Shelter
WorkShelter.desc: A quiet and safe environement is often mandatory to fulfill engineering work peacefully.

CamouflageFabric.name: Camouflage Fabric
CamouflageFabric.desc: [Fremen] are experts at staying unseen in the desert. Even a kulon can be hidden at the right place.

AssassinArmors.name: Stealth Gear
AssassinArmors.desc: It is easy to hide without moving, but remaining hidden in movement on a planet like Arrakis... That's a proper challenge.

WarMemoir.name: War Memoirs
WarMemoir.desc: Field experience is essential, but a good theoretical framework for warfare also improves performance.

PranaBindu.name: Prana Bindu Initiation
PranaBindu.desc: Even a short initiation to prana bindu training improves healing and pain resistance over time.

ScarringArmor.name: Scarring Armor
ScarringArmor.desc: A clothing technology inspired by the way scarring tissue are created can be used to make self-repairing armor.

EndocrineArouser.name: Endocrine Arouser
EndocrineArouser.desc: The body naturally produces all kind of hormones when it is hurt. Giving it a little boost is enough to reach almost superhuman capability.

SmallFormation.name: Small Formation
SmallFormation.desc: Smaller formations allow faster reactions to unexpected changes of plan and a tailored micro-management of the frontline.

WideNozzle.name: Wide Nozzle
WideNozzle.desc: Flamethrowers come in many different shapes and sizes. This nozzle has an unusual wide flow.

ElaccaInjector.name: Elacca Injector
ElaccaInjector.desc: With controlled amount of elacca drug carefully injected into their veins, the [!H_Soldier] loses all sense of self-preservation without suffering any numbing.

FixupKit.name: Fix-up Kit
FixupKit.desc: Equipping every soldier with basic disinfectants, painkillers and wound dressing tools let them keep fighting for longer.

BloodThinner.name: Blood Thinner
BloodThinner.desc: A less viscous blood increases oxygenation, leading to a nice sense of euphoria, but you better not cut yourself.

RunningSandshoes.name: Running Sandshoes
RunningSandshoes.desc: Sand is notoriously unstable. These shoes are designed to let the wearer run on sand even faster than they would on dirt.

FrighteningReputation.name: Frightening Reputation
FrighteningReputation.desc: The Sardaukar's reputation as remorseless and efficient killers is the main political asset of the Emperor.

JumpingBoot.name: Jumping Boot
JumpingBoot.desc: A boot reinforcing the calf muscles of its wearer would permit jumps of incredible length.

DryTraining.name: Dry Training
DryTraining.desc: The Fremen can train themselves to resist even better in the dry desert.

LoudBang.name: Loud Bang
LoudBang.desc: A sonic grenade might seem like a joke, but it will destabilize the most hardened veteran.

FocusedMind.name: Focused Mind
FocusedMind.desc: When you remain focused on the task at hand, nothing can slow you down.

FoldingFrame.name: Folding Frame
FoldingFrame.desc: A light frame that can be folded in seconds will improve drastically the installation time of most appliance.

ShadowScan.name: Shadow Scan
ShadowScan.desc: A precise scanner looking for differences in heat, air pressure, and visual movement will detect most attempt at concealement.

AmbushCamouflage.name: Ambush Camouflage
AmbushCamouflage.desc: The [!F_Special_2] is equipped to stay hidden in the same place and disable any passerby aircraft.

ElectronicScrambler.name: Electronic Scrambler
ElectronicScrambler.desc: A small piece of electronic is enough to scramble most of radio communication to a drone making it a lot harder to pilot.

MemoryImplant.name: Memory Implant
MemoryImplant.desc: Memory is an aspect of humanity that could easily be improved with machines.

DIYKit.name: DIY Kit
DIYKit.desc: [!V_Soldier]s are used to taking care of their own needs, but they have to start with some basic resources.

MultiParts.name: Multi-purpose Parts
MultiParts.desc: [!V_Elite]s often take care of the regular maintenance of drones on the battlefield, but they need the right parts to do it properly.

LongCannons.name: Long Cannons
LongCannons.desc: These long cannons increase the range of the drone, but also the size of their blind spot.

MountedExplosives.name: Mounted Explosives
MountedExplosives.desc: Lining the inside of a drone with incendiary bombs that trigger on death is an easy way to bring fear to the enemy.

TortureTools.name: Torture Tools
TortureTools.desc: With the proper equipment, the [H_Drone] can really strike a nerve in its opponent.

KrakenProtocols.name: Kraken Protocols
KrakenProtocols.desc: Applying some of the [!A_Frigate] adaptive technology to the [!A_Drone] makes it more versatile on the field.

SupportingField.name: Supporting Field
SupportingField.desc: The [!A_Drone] makes its presence known with blasting sounds, emboldening [Atreides-adjective] soldiers in the vicinity.

EvasionBooster.name: Evasion Booster
EvasionBooster.desc: An expensive but powerful engine can be the difference between life and death in an emergency.

OptmizedBedArrangement.name: Optimized Bed Arrangement
OptmizedBedArrangement.desc: By carefully utilizing all space inside the [!A_Drone], it's possible to increase its capacity, but the energy cost is significant.

OpticCamouflage.name: Optic Camouflage
OpticCamouflage.desc: With a good amount of optical fibers and a big battery, anything can disappear.

VirtualBlackBox.name: Virtual Black Box
VirtualBlackBox.desc: Learning from what remains of a wreck is a difficult skill, that can be made easier by designing a drone for it.

ShockDampener.name: Shock Dampener
ShockDampener.desc: Looted artifacts of less sturdy composition could give us a lot of insight on the enemy if they survived the trip.

MotivationalCashbox.name: Motivational Cashbox
MotivationalCashbox.desc: When you're doing well, everyone should know and wealth should be shared, so that they're motivated to do even better.

ShieldingStraightener.name: Shielding Straightener
ShieldingStraightener.desc: Most of the armor and gear you find on a battlefield is too damaged to use, but it's possible to fix it up just enough for one last time.

DistractingLights.name: Distracting Lights
DistractingLights.desc: A mesmerizing light show can easily make anyone forget the rest of the world.

MarchingColors.name: Marching Colors
MarchingColors.desc: In a conditioned mind, the simple view of certain colors and shapes can incentivize a specific behavior.

PropagandaMachine.name: Propaganda Machine
PropagandaMachine.desc: There is no down time for the diligent salesman. It's always the right time to sell your product.

BigBanner.name: Big Banner
BigBanner.desc: Sometimes, you just want to send a big message.

MaterialPreProcessor.name: Material Pre-processor
MaterialPreProcessor.desc: Identifying the target's weakness lets the [!V_Trooper] select the right weapons for the task.

HeavyShielding.name: Heavy Shielding
HeavyShielding.desc: A heavier frame and shielding resists shocks better.

AnatomicalScanner.name: Anatomical Scanner
AnatomicalScanner.desc: Organic entities generally have hidden weaknesses based on their evolved internal organization.

SmartArmor.name: Deep Signals
SmartArmor.desc: Encrypting strategic combat data in the electrostatic cloud around the [!V_Drone] enhances the fighting prowess of any drone at range.

SmartLens.name: Learning Transistors
SmartLens.desc: Adaptative lens and custom data processors improve the extraction of useful knowledge from combat analysis.

WarmMagnets.name: Strong Magnets
WarmMagnets.desc: High-energy magnets improve the speed of railgun's projectiles even further.

RepeaterNode.name: Repeater Node
RepeaterNode.desc: A miniaturized version of the neural node can be integrated into bigger drones to increase the range of the network.

DisruptiveField.name: Fractal Frequencies
DisruptiveField.desc: By applying various fractal frequencies to the Holtzman Coil, its electrostatic field becomes even more lethal.

FeedbackGate.name: Feedback Gate
FeedbackGate.desc: Loose energy from the electrostatic field can be harnessed and fed back into the Holtzman Coil to improve its resistance.

AdditionalCannons_Altar.name: Sky Facade
AdditionalCannons_Altar.desc: Painting the bottom of an aircraft in blue is a simple way to make it disappear.

ListeningDevices_Altar.name: Wreck Harness
ListeningDevices_Altar.desc: Catching the pieces and bits as they fall is a matter of great skill.

HeavyArmor_Altar.name: Makeshift Workshop
HeavyArmor_Altar.desc: Keeping a well-stocked reserve of scrap metal and tools on board allows for a speedy recovery on the go.

WindTraps_Altar.name: Symbol of Freedom
WindTraps_Altar.desc: A flying representation of the [Fremen-shortname]'s hopes for a freed Arrakis.

AdditionalSails_Altar.name: Storm Sails
AdditionalSails_Altar.desc: Going with the flow instead of fighting it is the key to surviving the storms of Arrakis.

ReconStations_Altar.name: Recon Stations
ReconStations_Altar.desc: With a rotating crew of lookouts, equipped with powerful spyglasses, it's easy to survey a large territory from the sky.

SandCloud_Altar.name: Sand Cloud
SandCloud_Altar.desc: In the desert, any strong wind immediatly raises a large murky cloud of sand.

FreedomSymbol_Altar.name: Supply Hold
FreedomSymbol_Altar.desc: A large hold lets the [!F_Frigate] bring supplies directly to the front.

LongRifles.name: Long Rifle
LongRifles.desc: Longer cannons are enough to increase precision at long range, but it comes at the prize of a lower projectile velocity.

ImprovedMedicine.name: Improved Medicines
ImprovedMedicine.desc: Better tools, and a larger selection of drugs and medicines tremendously increases the efficiency of [!A_Drone]s.

Medkit.name: Medkits
Medkit.desc: Trained medics in every squadron improves recovery, even behind enemy lines.

ChemicalWeapons.name: Chemical Weapons
ChemicalWeapons.desc: Impregnating weapons with caustic and poisonous compounds will contaminate enemy supplies.

WeaponizedConfiguration.name: Weaponized Configuration
WeaponizedConfiguration.desc: The [!A_Drone] can be reconfigured to assume a more active role in combat.

DualSwords.name: Dual Swords
DualSwords.desc: Wielding two sword leads to a more aggressive posture. It's also quite impressive.

GatlingGuns.name: Gatling Gun
GatlingGuns.desc: Gatling guns shoot small-caliber bullets at a demented speed, shredding less armored units to pieces.

Handgun.name: Handgun
Handgun.desc: Handguns can be used to attack unreachable targets without interfering with melee combat.

SardaukarCleaver_Old.name: Sardaukar's Cleaver
SardaukarCleaver_Old.desc: Swords can be optimized for cutting through bones and flesh, but they are less balanced and will be less practical against a fresh foe.

Shotguns.name: Shotgun
Shotguns.desc: These short-range rifles have a powerful kick.

BetterAmmunition.name: Better Ammunitions
BetterAmmunition.desc: High-end piercing ammunitions are costly but deadly.

BetterCombustibles.name: Better Combustible
BetterCombustibles.desc: These volatile compounds burn stronger but cannot be safely contained.

BetterFuelPumps.name: Better Fuel Pump
BetterFuelPumps.desc: With minutiae improvements to their combustible pumps, flamethrowers fire even further away.

ConcentratedExplosives.name: Concentrated Explosives
ConcentratedExplosives.desc: High-quality bombs produce a shockwave that shatters armor.

EMPAmmunitions.name: EMP Ammunitions
EMPAmmunitions.desc: These miniature generators of electromagnetic pulse built into a bullet casing fry electrical components at the cost of reduced penetration.

ExperimentalCombustibles.name: Experimental Combustible
ExperimentalCombustibles.desc: Adding a mix of phosphorus and other chemical compounds makes the combustible abrasive to skin and electronics alike.

FremenAssaultGear.name: Fremen Assault Gear
FremenAssaultGear.desc: [Fremen] use various specialized gear to ambush their opponents and get an edge in combat.

AnalysisVisors.name: Analysis Visor
AnalysisVisors.desc: Combat visors projecting strategic data in real time improve the units' awareness of their surroundings.

SharpenBlades.name: Sharpened Blade
SharpenBlades.desc: Nanoblades are so sharp that they cannot be held in a sheath. They also have a reduced parry surface.

SharpenTools.name: Sharpened Tools
SharpenTools.desc: A weapon specially made to cut through armor will not be as good for cutting flesh.

ShrapnelAmmunitions.name: Shrapnel Ammunitions
ShrapnelAmmunitions.desc: Shells that project small metal splinters in all directions are very effective against infantry.

CrysKnives.name: Skirmish Gear
CrysKnives.desc: The effect of surprise is often decisive in an evenly matched fight.

StickyNapalm.name: Sticky Napalm
StickyNapalm.desc: These new viscous combustibles stick to their victims while burning, resulting in gruesome wounds.

TemperedSword.name: Tempered Sword
TemperedSword.desc: A good blacksmith with good materials can forge hardened swords with an incredible edge.

BetterProtections.name: Better Protections
BetterProtections.desc: A well-adjusted uniform with a few more layers of armour in the right places can do a lot for survival in combat.

FoodAdditives.name: Food Additives
FoodAdditives.desc: The right food supplements can increase pain tolerance to superhuman levels.

SecretBeacon.name: Secret Beacon
SecretBeacon.desc: If the worst happens, a magnetic beacon hidden in the stillsuit, lets the clan recover Water and valuables.

CaffeinePills.name: Caffeine Pills
CaffeinePills.desc: With a proper stimulant, one can drastically reduce the time lost to sleeping. Surely, the side effects are not that big of a deal.

AdaptativeShield.name: Adaptative Shield
AdaptativeShield.desc: A device monitoring the health of the soldier is connected to an armor that can seal itself and deliver first care, preserving the life of its wearer.

LightArmor.name: Light Armor
LightArmor.desc: Even light armor will impede sneaking abilities.

PaddedShielding.name: Padded Shielding
PaddedShielding.desc: Padded armor and hulls help dissipate kinetic and thermal energy from explosive and incendiary weapons.

SalvagedShields.name: Salvaged Shield
SalvagedShields.desc: Salvaging is an art form that few people really master. While not as durable as a proper breastplate, a salvaged piece of armour can still save life in a hurry.

AdditionalBags.name: Additional Bags
AdditionalBags.desc: Greed is a sin, they say. Maybe the real sin is to let perfectly good weapons and gear to rot in the desert.

AnalysisTools.name: Analysis Tools
AnalysisTools.desc: A drone replacing some of its weaponry with scopes and lenses will provide valuable [Intel] to its pilot.

EnhancedWeapons.name: Enhanced Weapons
EnhancedWeapons.desc: Drone and turret weaponry is a question of balance between raw power and practicality. You can always equip them with a bigger gun, but you'll have to lose weight somewhere else.

ImprovedAlloy.name: Improved Alloy
ImprovedAlloy.desc: Costly alloys that absorb impacts instead of breaking can be a worthy investement for mechanical warfare.

UpperArmor.name: Upper Armor
UpperArmor.desc: Focusing armour on critical points improves durability.

Unlock_EquipmentSlot.desc: Unlock an equipment slot in the armory

ExtraEquipmentSlot_Flat.desc: Get <good>1</good> extra slot in the Armory to ::value:: units

TResUpkeep_PerUnitExtraEquipmentSlotUsed.desc: Get <good>1</good> extra slot in the Armory to ::value:: units

Faction_Block_PlaceVotes.desc: Cannot place votes in the Landsraad Council

Block_SetResAction.desc: Block application of actions on resolutions

Operation_Block.desc: Blocks all operations on the Region

Entity_NoSpeedLoss.desc: Speed cannot be reduced by hostile effects

Entity_MoveSpeed_InCombatFullCarryCapaci.desc: When the [!A_Drone] is full, it gains ::s_percent_value:: [Speed] in combat

Entity_MoveSpeed_ByMissingHealth_ARatio.desc: Gain up to ::percent_value:: move speed depending on missing [Life]

Unit_DamageVsAirships_Less50PercentHealt.desc: ::s_percent_value:: damage against flying units with less than 50% [Life]

Unit_DamageVsUnitOutsideTerritory_ARatio.desc: ::s_percent_value:: damage against units outside of their territory

Unit_PowerByMissingHealth_ARatio.desc: Gain up to ::percent_value:: [Power] depending on missing [Life]

Army_AffectedByAllyUnitBonus_Power_Flat.desc: ::s_value:: [Power] under the effect of at least one allied unit bonus

Unit_Power_MalusImmunity.desc: This unit is not affected by [Power] penalties

Unit_Block_ArmiesMaluses.desc: This unit is not affected by penalties inflicted by Military Units

Unit_Block_AbilitiesMaluses.desc: This unit is not affected by penalities inflicted by abilities

Building_Block_ArmiesMaluses.desc: This building is not affected by penalties inflicted by Military Units

Building_Block_AbilitiesMaluses.desc: This building is not affected by penalties inflicted by Abilities

Unit_BlockDeath.desc: This unit cannot die in any circumpstance but still triggers predeath effects

Army_RegenOutsideCombatHasSupply_Flat.desc: Recover ::percent_value:: [Life] per day outside combat as long as [Supply] is not empty

Entity_AttackSpeedByMissingHealth_ARatio.desc: Gain up to ::percent_value:: attack speed depending on missing [Life]

Army_Power_PerOwnedFactionArmies_ARatio.desc: ::s_percent_value:: Military Units [Power] per [$my(faction)-adjective] unit on the map

Army_Supply_NoDrain_TruceRegion.desc: No [Supply] drain in regions owned by factions in [Peace]

Entity_DamageReceived_MBAndMissileBatter.desc: ::s_percent:: damage received from [MissileBattery] and Main Bases

Entity_DamageReceived_InOwnOrNeutralTerr.desc: ::s_percent:: damage received in owned or neutral territory

Entity_LoneAttacker_Damage_MRatio.desc: ::percent:: damage when the unit is the only one attacking their target

Entity_ArmorByMissingHealth_Flat.desc: Gain up to ::value:: [Armor] depending on missing [Life]

Army_OnSelfHealthDecay_GainXP.desc: Effects that hurt owned units' [Life] also grant them <good>1</good> [Experience] per ::percent_value:: [Life] lost

Unit_HealthRegen_NoResupply_Penalty_Flat.desc: ::percent_value:: [Life] per day when away from supply sources

Army_FirstAttackPower_Bonus_Flat.desc: ::s_value:: [Power] on the first attack in combat

Army_FirstAttackDamage_Bonus_Flat.desc: ::s_value:: damage on the first attack in combat

Army_SpawnExperienceLevel_Flat.desc: Military Units start with ::value:: more [Experience] level

Untargetable.desc: This unit cannot be targeted by an attack

NearbyDeath_InCombat_GainHealthFlat.desc: While in combat, any nearby unit death heals ::value:: [Life]

Invincible.desc: Immune to damage from any source

Treaties_HasOne_LinkedRes_Prod_ARatio.desc: Having at least one [Treaty] contracted with another faction grants a production bonus of ::s_percent_value:: in its associated resource

Landsraad_NoAttentionNeeded.desc: No forced attention on Landsraad Council

Harvester_MaxCrew_GainTTrait_PerPayedCon.desc: After successfully paying the [$my(contract)], every [$my(harvester)]s with full crew gains ::target_effects:: permanently (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

Harvester_AutoDeploy.desc: This [Harvester] will be automatically deployed once danger has passed

Ornithopter_AutoRecon.desc: This [Ornithopter] will automatically recon unexplored areas

Recon_Speed_ARatio.desc: ::s_percent_value:: Recon speed of Points of Interest

Unit_NoRecon.desc: This unit cannot recon Point of Interest

Unit_OnInvestigatedWorldEventOutsideTerr.desc: Upon finishing investigating any [Discovery]outside your territory, gain ::target_effects::
Upon finishing investigating any [Discovery] outside your territory, recover ::percent_value:: [Supply]

Sandstorm_ReduceEffects_Bonus.desc: Your units and structures are more resilient to [Sandstorm]

Sandstorm_VillageBraceEffects.desc: Your village won't be damaged by [Sandstorm]s

Outpost_ReconnedSietchSameZone_AnnexCost.desc: ::percent:: [Authority] cost to [Annex] a [!Village] in a Region with a revealed [Sietch]

Outpost_SpecialRegion_No_Cost_Penalty.desc: No penalty [Authority] cost to [Annex] a [!Village] in a [SpecialRegion]

Outpost_NumberCost_MRatio.desc: Owned [!Village]s [Authority] penalty to [Annex] a [!Village] is reduced by ::inv_percent::

Outpost_Abandon_RefundAuthorityCaptureCo.desc: Abandoning a [!Village] refunds ::percent_value:: of the [Authority] capture cost

Village_TraitStack_Flat.desc: Effects of [!SpecificityVillage] are applied ::value:: more times

DeepDesert_Surounded_GainControl.desc: Surrounding a [DeepDesert] grants control over it.

Faction_DuplicateEachBuildingLimit_Flat.desc: Every non-major [!Village] [!Building_Village] can be constructed ::value:: more time anywhere

AllDistrict_ExtraBonus.desc: All district bonuses of this [$my(MainBase)] are doubled

AllDistricts_Eligible.desc: Counts as [Economy], [Military] and [Statecraft] for the purpose of district bonuses

Sietch_Allied_TradeResGain_ARatio.desc: ::s_percent_value:: resources received from trading with an allied [Sietch]

Sietch_RelationGains_MRatio.desc: All relation gains with this [Sietch] are reduced by ::inv_percent::

Faction_Sietches_InZoneWithMasterpiece_G.desc: [!Masterpiece]s increase relation with [Sietch]s in the same region

Zone_AlliedSietch_AdjacentRegionVillages.desc: ::target_effects:: in the region of an ally [Sietch] and its neighbors

Charter_HasOwner_NoProposal.desc: Claimed Charters will never be voted on in the [Landsraad]

NonHostileActions.desc: Prevents triggering Hostile actions when attacking other factions

AgentRecruitSpeed_PerAgentPenalty_MRatio.desc: ::s_percent:: impact from number of [Agent]s on the time to recruit a new one

AgtAtb_NoCount.desc: Does not count in the max [Agent]s count

AgtAtb_Mult_MRatio.desc: This agent's effect are multiplied by ::value::

AgtAtb_SlotBasicProd_ARatio.desc: This agent produces ::s_percent_value:: of every field resource

AgtAtb_SlotAllProd_ARatio.desc: This agent produces ::s_percent_value:: of every resource

Agt_MaxInfiltration_SlotAllProd_ARatio.desc: [Agent]s on fields at max [Infiltration] level produce ::s_percent_value:: of every resource

Entity_InfiltrationSlot_InZoneOwner_Flat.desc: ::s_value:: [Agent] slot in [!Infiltration] of the zone's owner faction

Agt_DailyCaptureChance_Flat.desc: ::s_percent_value:: daily chance of [Agent] capture when assigned on a faction

Agt_NoCapture.desc: No agent can be captured on this mission

EnemyAgt_DailyCaptureChance_Flat.desc: ::s_percent_value:: daily chance to capture an enemy [Agent] assigned on a [$my(faction)-shortname] slot

AgtCounterIntel_OperationAgentCapture_Ba.desc: ::percent_value:: chance to capture an [Agent] on operation detection

Infiltration_GreatFaction_MinLevel.desc: Great Houses [!Infiltration] levels cannot be lower than ::value::

Agt_StealChanceWhenCaptured.desc: ::percent_value:: chance every day to convert captured [Agent]s

Agt_SacrificeUsed_DecreaseOperationCost_.desc: Each sacrificed [Agent] permanently reduces their mission costs by ::inv_percent::

EnemyMission_DetectionChance_Flat.desc: ::s_percent_value:: chance to detect an enemy operation

Mission_EnemyDetectionChance_MRatio.desc: Enemies have ::s_percent:: chance to detect missions

UH_Militia_LifeRatioDamage_OnOwnerSiege_.desc: Damages [Militia] by ::percent_value:: of their [Life] when [Smugglers] units attack the [!Village]

UH_Self_CanResupply_VillageNotInCombat.desc: Refills [Supply] of nearby owned units when the [!Village] is not in combat

UH_Self_CanRegenUnits_VillageNotInCombat.desc: Regenerates [Life] of nearby owned units when the [!Village] is not in combat

Human_InCombat_Uncontrollable.desc: In combat, non-mechanical units cannot be controlled

NoOccupation.desc: Cannot occupy [!Village]s nor contest their occupation

Entity_Cloaked.desc: Cannot be seen outside of combat

CanUseAirfield_FactionAtPeace.desc: Can use Airfields of factions in [Peace]

Entity_Hidden.desc: Entity is hidden(not present on the map)

Faction_OnContractSuccessfullyPaid_GainS.desc: Upon successfully paying the [$my(contract)], get ::percent_value:: of [!MinorHouses] [CHOAMShare]s

DisbandOnTimerEnd.desc: These units will disband at the end of the timer

NoRaidSpawn.desc: No Raid will originate from this [Sietch]

Wormriding_NoCost.desc: Riding [Sandworm]s to or from this region does not consume [Thumper]s

Army_ZoneHasMasterpiece_GainTTrait.desc: Military Units in a region with any [!Masterpiece] gain ::target_effects::

Unit_Ground_NeutralTerritory_GainTTrait.desc: Ground units gain ::target_effects:: in neutral territory

Outpost_SameDomainBuildingCount_GainTTra.desc: ::target_effects:: in ally [!Village]s with ::value:: or more [!Building_Village]s of the same type

AdjacentRegionsLoneHarvester_GainTTrait.desc: ::target_effects:: to ally [F_Harvester]s in the Region and its neighbors (x::target_stacking_limit:: max)

Village_ZoneHasInferiorWindStrength_Gain.desc: Controlled [!Village] in regions with at most ::value:: [Wind] gain: ::target_effects_list::

Outpost_Regular_PatienceLoss.desc: Unrest and even rebellions may take place in your Villages

Village_AIExpansion_Ignore.desc: [!Village] won't be taken into account by AI

AI_NoSietch_Alliance.desc: Will not try to trade with sietches
